hero.title: Clients and Partners
hero.subtitle: We build solid relations with leading maritime companies based on trust, excellence, and consistent results

mainClientsHeader.mainClientsDescription: Companies that trust in our maritime expertise

mainClientsNewHeader.mainClientsDescription: All of our clients trust Noelza Service for specialized Ship Agency, Freight Forwarding, and Ship Licensing services. Since 2018, we have been strengthening solid partnerships that reflect our commitment to excellence and efficiency in the Angolan maritime sector.

testimonial.testimonialsDescription: Testimonials that reflect our dedication and quality

testimonials.quote: Efficiency, reliability, and exceptional technical knowledge. We recommend their services without hesitation.
testimonials.author: Maritime Manager

testimonials.quote: Noelza Service has been key to the success of our maritime operations in Angola. Exemplary professionalism.

testimonials.quote: Solid partnership that allows us to focus on our core business while Noelza handles all maritime operations.
